name: The Next Roll
description:
Your goal is simple:
Guess the next roll. Correct answers gives more time and points, wrong ones vice versa. Rack up the multipliers. Get a high score.
Be careful though, the multiplier works both ways..

Credits:
Music: Easy Cheesy - Zapsplat
Background:  Warped Miami Synth - ansimuz (https://ansimuz.itch.io/warped-miami-synth)
Dice animations: https://kicked-in-teeth.itch.io/dice-roll

Game made for GMTK Game Jam 2022.
